meaning_str.bing:
n. 节；部分；段；科
v. 切开；切断；做（动物或植物组织的）切片
网络. 截面；剖面；部门

切开；切断；做（动物或植物组织的）切片

部分；部门；科室；区域；横截面；细分；分段；地块；（组织、机构内的）派别；（法律文件的）条款；（报纸的）栏目；乐章；（戏剧的）幕；车厢；路段；病区；专区；专柜；展区；车间；年级部；声部
将…分成几部分；切开；给…分区；将…隔开；将（动植物组织）切成薄片进行显微镜检查

1.en: I got under the table and raised the blanket, and went to work to saw a section of the big bottom log out -- big enough to let me through.
1.cn: 我爬到桌子下边，把毯子掀了起来，动手锯起来，要把床底下那根大木头锯掉一节，大小能容得下我爬进爬出。

2.en: A special resolution under this section is in this Ordinance referred to as a resolution for reducing share capital.
2.cn: 本条所指的特别决议，在本条例中称为股本减少决议。

3.en: Once you're comfortable with the introductory section you're ready to dive into the section on model construction.
3.cn: 一旦您熟悉了这个介绍部分您就准备好可以进入模型构造部分了。

0.en: Look at this section over here. Even I don't really understand it.
0.cn: 快看这部分内容，连我都不懂是什么？

1.en: A certain section of our DNA contains instructions that tell our cells how to make antibodies.
1.cn: 我们DNA的一部分有指示来告诉我们的细胞怎么制造抗体。

2.en: Enzymes in the nucleus find the right section of DNA, then create a copy of these instructions, called messenger RNA.
2.cn: 细胞核中的酶找到正确的DNA部分，再制造这些指令的备份，叫做信使RNA。

3.en: All right, that's television and movies. Section nine: miscellany. The apartment's flag is a gold lion rampant on a field of azure.
3.cn: 好了，电视以及电影协议完成了。第九部分，杂项，公寓旗帜是一头在天蓝色背景下两腿站立的金色狮子。

4.en: Oh, I'm afraid not. Section seven here, on the right to enter the bathroom in emergency situations, is not specific as to what constitutes an emergency.
4.cn: 恐怕是的，第七部分这里，紧急情况下进入洗手间的权利，没有明确约定什么是紧急情况。

5.en: Excuse me. I've been to the art section of Bed, Bath & Beyond.
5.cn: 不好意思，我倒是去过家居店的艺术品区。

6.en: I'm putting you in for "Section 8", so I get your discharge. Dismiss.
6.cn: 我会把你视为符合“第八条例”。我会让你免役。解散。

7.en: By our Constitution and the laws of our land, including Section Blah-Blah of the Blah-Blah Act and Section Blah-Blah of Title Blah-Blah, Paragraph Bullshit-Bullshit.
7.cn: 凭借国会和我们国家的法律包括什么什么法第多少多少章，还有某某法令第多少多少章，第哪条狗屁款。

8.en: And we all read the paper together. You know? Maybe fight over the science section.
8.cn: 我们会一起看报纸，或许还会抢着看科学版。

9.en: Whatever. Put us on the Internet. I've always wanted a wedding with a comment section.
9.cn: 随便，网上直播就直播吧，我从小就"梦想"自己的婚礼有个留言区。

10.en: See, the way it works, is every night, when the maze changes, it opens up a new section.
10.cn: 其中的规律是每天晚上迷宫变化的时候，会打开一个新的区域。

11.en: Friendship Island has expanded. Glad they finally opened that friendly argument section.
11.cn: 友谊岛扩建了，真开心他们开放了和平争论区。

12.en: Last night, when you killed that Griever, Section 7 was open. It must be where it comes from.
12.cn: 昨晚你杀了那只怪兽，打开了第7区，它肯定是从那儿来的。

13.en: Yes. That's a nice pivot. Supervision is enough to establish employment as regards Section 230.
13.cn: 是的，说的很有道理，根据第230条规定，监管可以证明雇佣关系的建立。

14.en: It's not actually a box. It's, you know, a private section. It's more comfortable. You wanna go? Okay.
14.cn: 呵呵，不是说真的箱子啦，是个球场的专属区，看比赛更舒适些，想去吗? 好啊。

15.en: So today, Section 6 was open. Tomorrow, it will be 4, then 8, then 3. The pattern always stays the same.
15.cn: 而今天打开的是第6区，明天第4区，然后第8区，然后第3区。顺序一直都是这样的。

16.en: A 98. I deducted 2 points because you are not wearing your chef's hat, and that is a Section 5 violation.
16.cn: 98分。你没戴帽子所以扣两分，因为违反第五条规定。

17.en: They are coming our way. London was not an archive. It was a top secret branch of Starfleet designated Section 31.
17.cn: 他们正朝着我们前进呢。伦敦不只是个档案馆，还是星际舰队的一个高级机密分支，特指为31区。

18.en: The lyrics here. Drama queen got the cops, knocking at the door. Hair shop, don't late, waiting on her section Eight.
18.cn: 歌词里说，「戏剧女王惹到警察，正在敲门，美发店，不要迟到，在第八场等着她」。

19.en: Roommate agreement, section 27, paragraph 5: The roommate agreement, like the American flag, cannot touch the ground.
19.cn: 室友协议第27章第5段写明：室友协议书与美国国旗一样，都不许落地。
